lexUnit.name: cessation.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the fact or process of ceasing.

sentence.text: The demise of deep coal mining and hte cessation of mine water pumping into the almond catchment in the early 1970s has depleted river flows to the extent that dry weather flows in the river are now quite inadequate to assimilate increased volumes of sewage effluent from developing areas .
